plot: The malfunction that Ramastes has in his bathroom becomes a nightmare when the plumber sent to fix it claims that it's due to his negligence, leading to a proud struggle of unexpected consequences.
title: A.G.N.
plot_es: The malfunction that Ramastes has in his bathroom becomes a nightmare when the plumber sent to fix it claims that it's due to his negligence, leading to a proud struggle of unexpected consequences.
plot_en: The malfunction that Ramastes has in his bathroom becomes a nightmare when the plumber sent to fix it claims that it's due to his negligence, leading to a proud struggle of unexpected consequences.
